title: Rank Stats not working ?
body: Just finished a ranked game, lost. It didn't show any LP loss. Also my rank and league ranks not showing up. shows I'm doing placement with 17 wins and 5 losses ??

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=IZhaZ5cs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-30T03:41:28.427+0000)
>
> Hey,
> 
> We had an [issue after the maintenance](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/VKveAt3y-complete-scheduled-maintenance-30032016?comment=0007) where LP was not being recorded.  It was fixed after about an hour, but unfortunately any games that finished before the fix did not get their LP stats recorded.
> 
> Mindstar
